adjective.description: Designed or produced to meet someone's individual requirements.
examples: a steward will deliver personalized service to every passenger

adjective.description: (of an issue, argument, etc.) concerned with personalities or feelings rather than with general or abstract matters.
examples: general elections have become personalized contests between rival party leaders

adjective.description: (especially of a deity or spirit) personified.
examples: religious and magical systems involve personalized gods, spirits, or demons
